goal.en: "First, the teaching objectives:1. Recognize the theory of creativity, understanding the various elements of creativity-oriented.2. Recognizing the creativity related techniques, and apply it.3. The theoretical analysis is important in order to create and invent creative professional fields4. Application of creative techniques for creative design in life."
goal.ch: "一、教學目標：1.認識創造力相關理論，了解創造力的各種要素與面向。2.認識創造力相關技法，並且加以應用。3.以創造力理論分析專業領域的重要創造發明4.應用創意技法在生活中進行創意設計。"
